titles.title: A resolution to authorize legal representation in In the Matter of the Application of Committee on Finance.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/10/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Committee on Finance in the proceeding styled In the Matter of the Application of Committee on Finance for a Writ of Habeas Corpus Ad Testificandum, Misc. No. 07-134 (D.D.C.).
